comment: She is a great teacher and gets straight to the point. In my class, you got to choose your topic and got to write about it for the entire semester. I loved how she did not force us to write about something we did not care about. I would take her again. I had her hybrid class and it was great.

13 "minor assignments" (3 lowest are dropped), 3 essays, 1 creative project, and a short essay as the final. I took her for 1101 and 1102 and she's amazing. If you put forth some effort and ask her for feedback you should do well on essays. If you miss more than 5 classes, you fail the class (the dept.'s rule, not her's).

Prof. Timms is a really good professor. She's actually helpful when you ask her questions and gives great feedback on papers. She'll let you revise all of them but the final one. I actually enjoyed her class because she was funny and almost always kept it short. If you don't like working with random people, beware. She breaks us into groups often.

Professor Timms is awesome! She really wants you to do well and creates a very relaxed class, she even said multiple times during the semester she doesn't want her class to create any stress. She always has funny stories to tell in class and lets you speak your mind. You will have 3 main essays, on all grading is neither hard nor easy, its fair.

She makes it clear from the get-go of what you need to do to get an A in her class. She gives great feed back on all of her assignments. She does make you write a lot of papers, but if you pay attention in class, it's super easy. Great teacher, would recommend.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--SO MANY PAPERS--Clear grading criteria

comment: 4 papers, 6 daily grades (she drops the 3 lowest), 1 group project, 4 writing workshops. There's no final for her, just the last paper! Revisions on 1st 3 papers! Very honest, but easy grader! Passionate about her job and gives great feedback!! Textbook is mandatory, but rent, DON'T buy. You hardly use it!

She's awesome! She's very up-front, honest, and to the point. Do all the work and you should pass. She gives a lot of feed back. If you complete all your work you can revise essays, except for the last one (which is your final).

She cares about her students and is a likable person. She likes to start discussions, either fun or heated debates, and I look forward to the class. There are group projects but they're easy As. There were 4 papers for the 1101 class, and as long as you attend class and turn the paper in on time you can revise it, except the last one. Take her
She's so fun and makes class enjoyable. A tough grader, but she genuinely cares about her students. 10/10 would recommend.

Professor Timms is an amazing lit teacher. She is very funny, makes class enjoyable, and is very enthusiastic about literature. She's very realistic about how much she assigns and gives great feedback. No unnecessary assignments and grades fairly. Would highly recommend!
